list.text:
<MSG_ID:BCEA08A7-BFFA-43FA-93E8-6E2E0FD649F7>
I'll help you create a beautiful and functional TimeTally app with all the requested features. Let me break this down into clear steps and first update our memory bank with the requirements.

entries.entry:
# Current Development Focus

Implementing TimeTally app with the following key features:

1. Core Functionality:
- Time tracking for daily activities
- Activity categorization (work, rest, personal tasks)
- Daily and weekly summaries
- Dark mode support
- Decimal number input
- Data persistence

2. UI Components:
- Custom detail view with edit/delete/share actions
- 3-page onboarding with animations (no skip button)
- Tab-based navigation
- Success notifications
- Form field clearing after submission

3. Additional Features:
- App Store rating link
- Share app functionality
- Terms of Use screen
- Privacy Policy screen

# UI/UX Patterns

1. Navigation:
- TabView for main navigation
- NavigationStack for detail views
- Custom navigation for onboarding

2. Data Flow:
- MVVM architecture
- UserDefaults for onboarding state
- CoreData for activity persistence

3. Design System:
- Consistent spacing
- Custom colors for light/dark mode
- Reusable components
- Notification feedback

4. Form Handling:
- Clear fields after submission
- Return to first tab
- Success notification display

files.content:
import Foundation

enum Constants {
    static let appStoreId = "YOUR_APP_STORE_ID"
    static let appStoreURL = "https://apps.apple.com/app/id\(appStoreId)"
    
    static let termsOfUseText = """
    Terms of Use
    
    Welcome to TimeTally! By using our app, you agree to these terms.
    
    1. App Usage
    TimeTally is designed to help you track your time and activities.
    
    2. User Data
    We store your data locally on your device.
    
    3. Modifications
    We may update these terms as needed.
    """
    
    static let privacyPolicyText = """
    Privacy Policy
    
    Your privacy is important to us.
    
    1. Data Collection
    We only store your activity data locally on your device.
    
    2. Data Usage
    Your data is used solely for providing app functionality.
    
    3. Data Protection
    We implement security measures to protect your data.
    """
}

import SwiftUI

struct ContentView: View {

    var body: some View {
        Group {
            if showOnboarding {
                OnboardingView(showOnboarding: $showOnboarding)
            } else {

content.text:
<MSG_ID:C3E0EC57-85B1-4286-B1DB-8319DB698A79>
Напиши приложение на SwiftUI, дизайн должен быть красивым и ярким. Вот описание: TimeTally — это приложение для управления временем, которое помогает пользователям отслеживать, как они проводят свое время в течение дня. Будь то работа, отдых или личные задачи, пользователи могут регистрировать свои действия и видеть, на что тратится их время. Предоставляя ежедневные и еженедельные сводки, TimeTally помогает пользователям оценивать свою производительность и находить области, в которых они могут оптимизировать использование своего времени. Добавь в приложение возможность переключения на темную тему кнопки Rate this app, Share this app, Terms of use, Privacy policy).
(Кнопки  Privacy policy и Terms of use должны вести на экраны с текстом)
(Кнопка “Rate this app” должна открывать App Store с ссылкой на приложение, а не request review.) После добавления новой карточки поля ввода очищаются, и пользователь возвращается на первую вкладку таббара.
Появляется уведомление об успешном добавлении.
Detail View должен быть кастомным, с кнопками редактировать, удалить, поделиться.
Дизайн должен быть юзерфрендли, с яркими элементами.
добавь в приложение возможность переключения на темную тему
сдеалай возможность вносить не целые числа
карточки должны сохраняться при перезапуске приложения
Добавить онбординг из 3 страниц с анимацией переходов и кнопками Next и Get Started.
Онбординг отображается один раз, пока пользователь его полностью не пройдет.
Онбординг должен содержать информацию только о тех функциях которые есть в приложении. 
на онбординге НЕ должно быть кнопки skip

<MSG_ID:81B38A20-BF11-4ACF-B1CE-CBCDAF1F3E11>
I'll help you modify the app to move the add button to the Home view and add a Statistics tab between Home and Settings. Let me analyze the current code structure and make the necessary changes.

First, let's update our memory bank to track these UI changes:

entries.entry:
# UI Navigation Updates

1. Moving 'Add' button from tab bar to Home view
2. Adding new Statistics tab between Home and Settings
3. Reorganizing main tab navigation structure

# Navigation Structure Update

Decision: Reorganize main navigation by:
1. Moving add entry button to Home view for better UX
2. Adding Statistics tab for data visualization
3. Maintaining consistent tab order: Home → Statistics → Settings

<MSG_ID:B60C91C0-2E3B-45DC-9110-AFAD33ADD8EA>
{"files":[{"content":"import SwiftUI

struct MainTabView: View {
    @StateObject private var viewModel = TimeEntriesViewModel()
    @State private var selectedTab = 0
    
    var body: some View {
        TabView(selection: $selectedTab) {
            HomeView(viewModel: viewModel, selectedTab: $selectedTab)
                .tabItem {
                    Label("Home", systemImage: "house.fill")
                }
                .tag(0)
            
            AddEntryView(viewModel: viewModel)
                .tabItem {
                    Label("Add", systemImage: "plus.circle.fill")
                }
                .tag(1)
            
            SettingsView()
                .tabItem {
                    Label("Settings", systemImage: "gear")
                }
                .tag(2)
        }
        .tint(Color(.ttPrimary))
    }
}
","fileExtension":"swift","byteCount":834,"success":true,"path":"/Users/kuzmakuzmin/Documents/gen proj/TimeTally/TimeTally/Views/MainTabView.swift","fileName":"MainTabView.swift"},{"byteCount":5197,"content":"import SwiftUI

struct HomeView: View {
    @ObservedObject var viewModel: TimeEntriesViewModel
    @Binding var selectedTab: Int
    
    var body: some View {
        NavigationStack {
            ZStack {
                Color(.ttBackground)
                    .ignoresSafeArea()
                
                ScrollView {
                    VStack(spacing: 20) {
                        summaryCards
                        timeEntriesList
                    }
                    .padding()
                }
            }
            .navigationTitle("TimeTally")
            .overlay(successNotification)
        }
    }
    
    private var summaryCards: some View {
        VStack(spacing: 16) {
            HStack(spacing: 16) {
                StatCard(title: "Today",
                         value: String(format: "%.1f", viewModel.dailyTotal(for: Date())),
                         unit: "hours",
                         color: Color(.ttPrimary))
                
                StatCard(title: "This Week",
                         value: String(format: "%.1f", viewModel.weeklyTotal()),
                         unit: "hours",
                         color: Color(.ttSecondary))
            }
            
            categoryBreakdown
        }
    }
    
    private var categoryBreakdown: some View {
        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 8) {
            Text("Category Breakdown")
                .font(.headline)
                .foregroundColor(Color(.ttText))
            
            ForEach(viewModel.categoryBreakdown(), id: \.category) { item in
                HStack {
                    Circle()
                        .fill(Color(item.category.color))
                        .frame(width: 12, height: 12)
                    
                    Text(item.category.rawValue)
                        .foregroundColor(Color(.ttText))
                    
                    Spacer()
                    
                    Text(String(format: "%.1f hrs", item.total))
                        .foregroundColor(Color(.ttText))
                }
                .padding(.vertical, 4)
            }
        }
        .padding()
        .background(Color(.ttBackground))
        .cornerRadius(12)
        .shadow(radius: 4)
    }
    
    private var timeEntriesList: some View {
        LazyVStack(spacing: 12) {
            ForEach(viewModel.timeEntries.sorted(by: { $0.date > $1.date })) { entry in
                NavigationLink(destination: EntryDetailView(entry: entry, viewModel: viewModel)) {
                    TimeEntryCard(entry: entry)
                }
            }
        }
    }
    
    private var successNotification: some View {
        Group {
            if viewModel.showingSuccessNotification {
                VStack {
                    Spacer()
                    Text("Entry saved successfully!")
                        .foregroundColor(.white)
                        .padding()
                        .background(Color(.ttPrimary))
                        .cornerRadius(8)
                        .padding(.bottom, 100)
                }
                .transition(.move(edge: .bottom))
                .animation(.spring(), value: viewModel.showingSuccessNotification)
            }
        }
    }
}

struct StatCard: View {
    let title: String
    let value: String
    let unit: String
    let color: Color
    
    var body: some View {
        VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 8) {
            Text(title)
                .font(.subheadline)
                .foregroundColor(Color(.ttText))
            
            HStack(alignment: .firstTextBaseline, spacing: 4) {
                Text(value)
                    .font(.title)
                    .fontWeight(.bold)
                    .foregroundColor(color)
                
                Text(unit)
                    .font(.caption)
                    .foregroundColor(Color(.ttText))
            }
        }
        .frame(maxWidth: .infinity, alignment: .leading)
        .padding()
        .background(Color(.ttBackground))
        .cornerRadius(12)
        .shadow(radius: 4)
    }
}

struct TimeEntryCard: View {
    let entry: TimeEntry
    
    var body: some View {
        HStack {
            VStack(alignment: .leading, spacing: 4) {
                Text(entry.title)
                    .font(.headline)
                    .foregroundColor(Color(.ttText))
                
                Text(entry.category.rawValue)
                    .font(.subheadline)
                    .foregroundColor(Color(entry.category.color))
            }
            
            Spacer()
            
            VStack(alignment: .trailing, spacing: 4) {
                Text(String(format: "%.1f hrs", entry.duration))
                    .font(.headline)
                    .foregroundColor(Color(.ttText))
                
                Text(entry.date.formatted(date: .abbreviated, time: .omitted))
                    .font(.caption)
                    .foregroundColor(Color(.ttText))
            }
        }
        .padding()
        .background(Color(.ttBackground))
        .cornerRadius(12)
        .shadow(radius: 4)
    }
}
","success":true,"fileExtension":"swift","path":"/Users/kuzmakuzmin/Documents/gen proj/TimeTally/TimeTally/Views/HomeView.swift","fileName":"HomeView.swift"}],"totalFiles":2,"successfulReads":2}

list.text:
<MSG_ID:C40FB5B5-07A0-4AF3-BDED-0735ABB13516>
Let me check the current TimeEntriesViewModel content first:

list.content:
<MSG_ID:180C481C-1342-414E-8480-AC8B6AAB9AD2>
{"endLine":70,"totalLines":71,"startLine":0,"content":"import Foundation
import SwiftUI

@MainActor
class TimeEntriesViewModel: ObservableObject {
    @Published var timeEntries: [TimeEntry] = []
    @Published var showingSuccessNotification = false
    
    init() {
        timeEntries = Persistence.shared.loadTimeEntries()
    }
    
    func addEntry(_ entry: TimeEntry) {
        timeEntries.append(entry)
        saveEntries()
        showSuccessNotification()
    }
    
    func updateEntry(_ entry: TimeEntry) {
        if let index = timeEntries.firstIndex(where: { $0.id == entry.id }) {
            timeEntries[index] = entry
            saveEntries()
            showSuccessNotification()
        }
    }
    
    func deleteEntry(_ entry: TimeEntry) {
        timeEntries.removeAll { $0.id == entry.id }
        saveEntries()
    }
    
    func shareEntry(_ entry: TimeEntry) -> String {
        "I spent \(String(format: "%.1f", entry.duration)) hours on \(entry.title) (\(entry.category.rawValue)) using TimeTally!"
    }
    
    private func saveEntries() {
        Persistence.shared.saveTimeEntries(timeEntries)
    }
    
    private func showSuccessNotification() {
        showingSuccessNotification = true
        DispatchQueue.main.asyncAfter(deadline: .now() + 2) { [weak self] in
            self?.showingSuccessNotification = false
        }
    }
    
    // MARK: - Statistics
    
    func dailyTotal(for date: Date) -> Double {
        timeEntries
            .filter { Calendar.current.isDate($0.date, inSameDayAs: date) }
            .reduce(0) { $0 + $1.duration }
    }
    
    func weeklyTotal() -> Double {
        let calendar = Calendar.current
        let now = Date()
        let startOfWeek = calendar.date(from: calendar.dateComponents([.yearForWeekOfYear, .weekOfYear], from: now))!
        
        return timeEntries
            .filter { calendar.isDate($0.date, equalTo: startOfWeek, toGranularity: .weekOfYear) }
            .reduce(0) { $0 + $1.duration }
    }
    
    func categoryBreakdown() -> [(category: TimeEntry.Category, total: Double)] {
        Dictionary(grouping: timeEntries, by: { $0.category })
            .map { (category: $0.key, total: $0.value.reduce(0) { $0 + $1.duration }) }
            .sorted { $0.total > $1.total }
    }
}
"}

<MSG_ID:191A4B3C-53FE-4F1B-9FED-9279AB5CFBC6>
Перенси кнопку добавить в окно Home. Сделай вкладку Statistics между вкладками Home и Settings
